a list of the times at which buses, trains, planes etc arrive and leave
a list of the times of classes in a school, college etc
a plan of events and activities, with their dates and times
The Council has set out a timetable for returning to civilian rule.
to plan that something will happen at a particular time in the future
The carnival parade is timetabled for 12.00 on both days.
to arrange the times at which classes will take place in a school or college
The course is timetabled for one period each week.
Art students have very few timetabled hours.
a plan giving dates and times when events will take place or things must be done
It is your responsibility to produce the report according to the timetable agreed with us.
They drew up a timetable for the development of a prototype.
a list of the times at which buses, trains, planes etc arrive and leave
A full railway timetable is available on the Internet.
